question: What are the latest trends in IT investments among companies in the tech industry?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies within the tech industry along with their IT Budget metrics.
Extract the latest data regarding Company IT Focus Areas to see what technological advancements or investments they are pursuing.
Analyze Company Deal Master records to pinpoint recent deals focusing on technology services indicating current investment trends.
Review Company IT Partner details to identify active technology partnerships that could indicate investment shifts or technological focus.
Summarize the engagement metrics from Social Media Info to understand how companies are promoting their technological advancements in public platforms.
